roleset.name: make easier

example.name: nice -n- simple
example.text: Among other things , Mr. Bologna said that the sale will facilitate Gen - Probe 's marketing of a diagnostic test for acquired immune deficiency syndrome , or AIDS .

propbank.arg: Gen - Probe 's marketing of a diagnostic test for acquired immune deficiency syndrome , or AIDS

example.name: both args
example.text: facilitation of synaptic transmission by EGL-30 Ggalpha

roleset.note: FACILITATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'facilitate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. Comparison with 'ease'. (from facilitate.01-v predicate notes)
